ygData.subject: Re: do the rythms resistances even work?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... oh, all 12 were force strikes; i just died twice from it. our cleric couldn t heal me fast enough both times. :(
ygData.messageBody:
> > resistance to 111 (!), yet i was still unable to resist a single spell
> > from an evoker who conned white to me (out of about 12 spells). as noted
> > in the new 2.0 song guide, the spell shield seems to be non-existant. as a
> > result of my experience i can't even think why i should bother with magic
> > resistance at all, since i got ripped to shreds by force strike twice.
>
> What were the other 10 spells? Magic resist only affects

oh, all 12 were force strikes; i just died twice from it. our cleric
couldn't heal me fast enough both times. :(
